tourBios.otherVics: (3): 2002 Kentucky Open. 2014 National Car Rental PGA Assistants' Championship, Metropolitan Open.
tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished T3 at the PGA Professional National Championship.
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Named the Metropolitan PGA Player of the Year...Captured the National Car Rental PGA Assistants' Championship...Won the Metropolitan Open at Trump National GC in Bedminster, N.J.

2009: Was the Tri-State Player of the Year...Won the PGA Professional National Championship to earn an invitation to the PGA Championship...At the year's final major championship, at Hazeltine National GC in Minnesota, finished T76.

2007: Named the Kentucky Section PGA Assistant Player of the Year for a second time.

2005: Earned Kentucky Assistant Player of the Year honors from the Kentucky Section PGA.

2002: Won the Kentucky Open.

Amateur: Played collegiately at the University of Louisville. Won the 2000 San Diego State Aztec Invitational.
tourBios.personal: Is an assistant pro at Winged Foot GC in Mamaroneck, N.Y...Has made six holes-in-one, with four of them coming during compeition.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR was T76th in 2009 at the PGA Championship.
